front.title: IEEE Guide for Seismic Qualification of Class 1E Metal-Enclosed Power Switchgear Assemblies

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard provides specific requirements and guidance for seismic qualification of metal-enclosed power switchgear assemblies. This guide may also be used in other applications in which seismic response of metal-enclosed power switchgear assemblies is a consideration.
